chapters.title: Chapter 47: The Truth of a Viewing
chapters.info: Alric, p. 767 (693)—Warder bonded to Siuan Sanche for almost twenty years (i.e., almost since she was raised to the shawl). He never complained when her position as Amyrlin Seat kept him in the Tower, never complained when that position required her to be out of his immediate presence for long periods of time. He was murdered by Elaida and her supporters when they deposed Siuan. See also Sanche, Siuan.
